common.logoutDesc: Are you sure you want to logout?

errors.unableObtainDeviceCodeUrl: Unable to obtain device code URL
errors.unableValidateAuthorizationCode: Unable to validate the authorization code
errors.authorizationCodeNull: Your authorization code cannot be null
errors.loginEpicFirst: Please log in to the Epic Games account first.
errors.botLimitReached: Sorry, you have reached the limit of bots.

accountScreen.removeEpicDesc: Do you want to remove your Epic Games connection: {{username}}?
accountScreen.removeEpicDescNoUser: Do you want to remove your Epic Games connection?
accountScreen.removeDiscordDesc: Do you want to remove your Discord connection: {{username}}?
accountScreen.verifyAccountDesc: Please verify your email to unlock features like creating multiple bots and categories.
accountScreen.verifyAccountModalDesc: Verify your FNLB account email by clicking the button below.
accountScreen.changePasswordDesc: Keep your account secure by updating your password regularly. Changing your password will log you out from all active sessions on other devices and FNLB apps.
accountScreen.deleteAccountDesc: If you decide to delete your account, please be aware that this action is irreversible. All your data will be permanently removed.
accountScreen.neverShareApiTokenDesc: Your API Tokens are private. Sharing them can lead to unauthorized access to your bots and security risks. Keep them safe!
accountScreen.regenerateApiTokenDesc: Are you sure you want to regenerate your API Token? The old API Token will stop working and all your bots will be offline until you update them with the new token. Only regenerate your API Token if you believe it has been compromised.
accountScreen.apiTokenRegeneratedDesc: Your API token has been regenerated successfully.

myBotsScreen.createYourFirstCustomBot: Create your first custom FNLB bot by pressing the button below.

authScreen.loginHeader: Login with your FNLB Account first

registerForm.privacyCheckText: I agree FNLB's <termsLink>Terms of Service</termsLink> and <privacyLink>Privacy Policy</privacyLink>.
registerForm.privacyCheckError: Please read and accept the Privacy Policy and the Terms Of Service.

settings.title: Settings
settings.autoStartFNLBDesc: Automatically launch FNLB when your computer starts.
settings.autoStartBotsDesc: Start your bots automatically when the app launches.
settings.confirmBeforeExitDesc: Show a confirmation dialog before closing the app if you have bots running.
settings.disableDiscordRPCDesc: Disable the RPC connection between Discord and FNLB.
settings.keyboardShortcutsDesc: Enable keyboard shortcuts for faster navigation.
settings.autoThemeSwitchDesc: Switch between light and dark themes based on your system settings.
settings.compactModeDesc: Use a more compact layout to fit more bots on screen.
settings.performanceModeDesc: Optimize for performance by reducing the number of elements on the screen.
settings.dataSaverDesc: Reduce data usage by limiting updates and background activity.
settings.reducedMotionDesc: Minimize or disable interface animations and motion effects.
settings.reducedBlurEffectsDesc: Reduce or disable blur effects to improve performance.
settings.privacyModeDesc: Hide sensitive information and everything you choose below.
settings.hideUsernameDesc: Hide your FNLB username from the interface.
settings.hideEmailsDesc: Hide your email address and your bots' email addresses.
settings.hideBotNamesDesc: Hide the names of your bots.
settings.hidePartyMemberNamesDesc: Hide the names of the party members.
settings.openChatDesc: Press this key to open the chat.
settings.openEmoteDesc: Press this key to open the emote selector.
settings.openFriendsDesc: Press this key to open the friends sidebar.

botScreen.createYourFNLBAccount: Create your FNLB account to control the bot

partyMember.putsTheBotInMatchState: Puts the bot in match state
partyMember.putsTheBotInNormalState: Puts the bot in normal state
partyMember.hidesTheBotFromTheLobby: Hides the bot from the lobby
partyMember.showsTheHiddenBotOnTheLobby: Shows the hidden bot on the lobby
partyMember.createAccountToControlBot: Create your FNLB account to control the bot
partyMember.loginToControlBot: Login with your FNLB account to control the bot

chat.registerHeader: Create your FNLB account to use the chat
chat.welcome: Welcome to the chat @{{username}}, make sure to follow the rules.
chat.registerEpic: Register & connect your Epic Games account to send messages.

success.startYourBot: You can now start your bot!

createBotModal.createCustomBotDesc: To create a FNLB bot, you need a brand new Epic Games account.
createBotModal.createEpicAccount: Create a new Epic Games account
createBotModal.alreadyHaveAccount: I already have a new Epic Games account.
createBotModal.importBotTitle: Let's Import your Bot's Epic Games Account
createBotModal.dontImportMainAccountDesc: FNLB bots are designed to work on brand new accounts that no one else is using, make sure your bot account it's not the same account as your main account.
createBotModal.importingBot: Importing your bot. Please click on confirm…
createBotModal.newTabOpened: A new tab has been opened. Please click on confirm…
createBotModal.unableImportBot: Unable to import your bot's account. Make sure to click on "confirm".
createBotModal.importBotAccount: Import your bot's Epic Games account:
createBotModal.pageNotOpened: If the page didn't open automatically, click here to open it.
createBotModal.importBotEpicAccount: Import your bot's Epic Games Account
createBotModal.importWithAuthCode: Import your bot with an Authorization Code
createBotModal.verifyAccountDesc: You already have a bot! Verify your FNLB account to create more bots.
createBotModal.authorizationCodeDesc: Paste the Authorization code you got from the website.
createBotModal.confirmBotCreation: Are you sure you want to create a bot for the account: {{displayName}}?
createBotModal.notMainAccountWarning: Make sure it's not your main account and you don't use it.
createBotModal.confirmNotMainAccount: Yes, "{{displayName}}" is not my main account
createBotModal.noBotLobbiesDesc: To access bot lobbies, you need a newly created account. If you use this account, you may encounter real players in your games. Do you want to continue?
createBotModal.assignCategoryForBot: We need to assign a category for your new bot: {{displayName}}
createBotModal.categoryDescription: A category will allow you to change the settings of your bots.

deleteAccountModal.deleteBotsAndCategories: Please delete all your bots and categories and try again.
deleteAccountModal.warning: Are you sure that you want to delete your FNLB account? This will immediately log you out of your account and you will not be able to log in again.

createCategoryModal.categoryLimitReached: Sorry, you have reached the limit of categories.
createCategoryModal.contactSupportForMoreCategories: Contact support if you need more categories.
createCategoryModal.verifyAccountDescription: You already have a category! Verify your FNLB account to create more categories.

editCategoryModal.deleteCategoryDescription: Are you sure you want to delete your category?

editBotModal.botNicknameDesc: The bot nickname. Useful when the bot is offline.
editBotModal.deleteDesc: Are you sure you want to delete your bot?
editBotModal.deleteVipTooltip: Contact support to delete your VIP bot

editAccountUsernameModal.usernameDescription: The new username of your account.

cosmeticModal.errorBroke: Something went wrong while loading cosmetics

startBotsModal.limitedFunctionalityDesc: Due to browser limitations, you can only run one bot at a time. If you need to run multiple bots, consider using the <0>FNLB App</0>.
startBotsModal.botLimitReachedDesc: Your settings allow only {{count}} bot to start. To increase this limit, adjust the number of shards or the max bots per shard.
startBotsModal.youNeedToSelect: You need to select at least one category

matchHistoryModal.waitUntilSomeoneUsesBot: Wait until someone uses the bot.

connections.unableConnectDiscord: Unable to connect your Discord Account. Make sure to click on "authorize".
connections.unableConnectEpic: Unable to connect your Epic Games Account. Make sure to click on "confirm".

epicLinkModal.featureRequirement: In order to use this feature, you need to connect your Epic Games Account to your FNLB Account. Please choose:
epicLinkModal.connectEpicDescription: Connect your Epic Games account by choosing a preferred method:
epicLinkModal.connectEpicDirectly: Connect your Epic Games account directly.
epicLinkModal.connectViaDiscordDescription: Use your Discord Connections to link your Epic Games account.
epicLinkModal.connectViaDisplayNameDescription: Connect your Epic Games account using your Display Name.
epicLinkModal.dontConnectBotAccountDesc: When connecting your accounts, it must be the Epic Games account you will be using the bot with, not the bot's own account.
epicLinkModal.connectingAccount: Connecting your account. Please click on confirm…
epicLinkModal.successfullyConnected: Successfully connected your Epic Games Account:
epicLinkModal.unableToConnect: Unable to connect your Epic Games Account. Make sure to click on "confirm".
epicLinkModal.connectEpicInstructions: You can connect your Epic Games Account by pressing the button. Make sure is NOT your bot account.
epicLinkModal.pageDidntOpen: If the page didn't open automatically, click here to open it.
epicLinkModal.connectEpicDisplayNameInstructions: To connect your Epic Games account to your FNLB Account just search your Epic Games Display Name and then click "Connect".
epicLinkModal.unverifiedMethod: This method is unverified and will only work with your own custom FNLB bots.
epicLinkModal.goToLinkedRoles: To connect your Epic Games account to your FNLB Account head over to the FNLB Official Discord Server on <link/>
epicLinkModal.connectAccountsFirst: Connect your accounts, connecting first Epic Games and then FNLB.
epicLinkModal.almostDone: You're almost done! Now simply select the Epic Games Account that you want to connect to your FNLB Account and you're done.
epicLinkModal.connectEpicViaDisplayName: Connect Epic Games via Display Name
epicLinkModal.connectOwnerViaDisplayName: We need to connect your main Epic Games account to your FNLB Account to set the owner of the bot. Just search your Epic Games Display Name and then click "Connect".

discordLinkModal.discordLinkModalInstructions: You can connect your Discord Account by pressing the button below.
discordLinkModal.discordLinkModalPageDidntOpen: If the page didn't open automatically, click here to open it.

verification.emailSentDesc: A verification email has been sent to your account.
verification.verifyAccountEmailDesc: In order to use this feature, you need to verify your FNLB account email.
verification.checkEmailForVerification: Check your email for a verification link.
verification.checkEmailForVerificationWithEmail: Check your email {{email}} for a verification link.
verification.checkSpamFolder: If you haven't received it, check your "spam" folder or click the button below to resend it.

notifications.passwordUpdatedDesc: Your password has been updated successfully.
notifications.checkConnectionOrReload: Please check your connection or reload the app.
notifications.letUsKnowProblem: Let us know if this problem persists:

connectionLimit.title: Connection Limit Reached
connectionLimit.description: Sorry, you have the app open in too many devices or browser tabs. Please close one and reload the app to continue.
connectionLimit.limitMessage: You can only have FNLB open in a limited number of devices or tabs at the same time.
connectionLimit.helpDescription: If you believe this is a mistake or need assistance, our support team is here to help.
connectionLimit.preferEmail: Prefer email? Reach us directly at:
connectionLimit.thankYou: Thank you for understanding our usage policy.

bannedScreen.sorryGeneric: Sorry, your account has been banned from using FNLB.

bannedScreen.preferEmail: Prefer email? Reach us directly at:
bannedScreen.thankYouUnderstanding: Thank you for understanding our community guidelines.
